content: Do you perhaps have the quick filter toolbar enabled and have the unread button selected on it?
creator: MattAuSupport

content:
I guess wait a month https://github.com/eyalroz/removedupes/issues/223

But seriously I have had issues with duplicate message twice in 20 years and that was when I was merging data from several old mbox files into a single one. Why anyone would need such a tool in the month post release of a new version in an IMAP world I really do not understand. Perhaps you have other issues that need to be looked at.
creator: MattAuSupport

content:
How about starting by right clicking a tab and selecting "close other tabs". That will clean up that issue of loading tabs. Then you might try uninstalling Norton to fix the rest of the issue, or Provide results for the following test on your system

  1. Does Thunderbird work as expected in Thunderbird troubleshooting mode?
  2. Does Thunderbird work as expected with your OS started in safe mode with Networking. Instructions for each operating system: Windows 10/11, Windows 8, Windows 7, OSX
creator: MattAuSupport
